text:
@realDonaldTrump @potus @whitehouse 

comrade, mail-in ballots are safe and secure

you are the fraud, transparently laying the groundwork to challenge the results for when you lose in november.

your entire life is a giant fraud.

buh-bye 👋

#fakepresident #impotus 

https://t.co/KZrt0vQ01r
